channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Match of the Day
channel.desc: Highlights from the first weekend of the 2025/26 Premier League season. There are six matches to enjoy, including two games involving newly promoted Sunderland and Burnley.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Scotland's Sacred Islands With Ben Fogle
channel.desc: Ben takes a tiny passenger ferry from mainland Argyll down the length of Loch Sween to arrive on Islay. While the island is famed for its whisky, the island has more distilleries than churches, its links to Christianity are ancient.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Homes Under the Hammer
channel.desc: Jacqui gets a sinking feeling as she tours a Norwich house suffering from subsidence, while Martin is really surprised by developers' plans to rip everything out of a six-bedroom house in Cardiff. There are plans for a four-bedroom terrace in Dover.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Bargain Hunt
channel.desc: Danny Sebastian hosts from Harrogate in North Yorkshire, where he learns about a scheme to recycle items from landfill. Two red and blue teams battle it out, with help from experts Izzie Balmer and John Cameron, before heading to the auction.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: BBC Weekend News
channel.desc: The latest national and international news from the BBC.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Weather for the Week Ahead
channel.desc: Detailed weather forecast.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Songs of Praise
channel.desc: The Rev Kate Bottley celebrates 2025's summer of women's sport and explores the role faith can play on the pitch, from grassroots to grand finals. Kate joins the UK's first female football team that also acts as a church ministry.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Escape to the Country
channel.desc: Jules Hudson takes in Scotland's stunning Cairngorms as he helps a couple from the Isle of Wight find a rural property that will fulfil their ambitions for both a new home and a new business. Jules also drops in on a family who moved to the region to start a fly-fishing school and becomes their star pupil for the day.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Deadly 60
channel.desc: Steve heads to the Mexican island of Cabo Pulmo, where the people work tirelessly to bring their surrounding oceans back to life and make it a marine reserve.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Parenthood
channel.desc: Parenting in the ocean demands dedication and intelligence. From navigating the reef, to teaching young to hunt giants, these parents have remarkable strategies.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Ghostbusters
channel.desc: Supernatural comedy about three New York parapsychology professors who decide to set up a ghost-catching agency. Soon a storm of malevolent spirits threatens to destroy the city, and the mysterious contents of a woman's fridge suggest a paranormal Armageddon.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: BBC Weekend News
channel.desc: The latest national and international news from the BBC.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: BBC London
channel.desc: News, sport and weather from London.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: BBC Weather
channel.desc: The latest weather forecast.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Countryfile
channel.desc: Knaresborough is a place steeped in history. But it is the River Nidd's story that flows through it all. John Craven explores the history shaped by the river before meeting those who care for it today.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Parenthood
channel.desc: Parents must constantly balance risk and reward when raising young in open grasslands. Whilst abundant grass promises plentiful food and places to call home, this alone cannot guarantee success.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Antiques Roadshow
channel.desc: The team return to Portchester Castle in Hampshire on the south coast of England. Mark Smith is stunned to see a Victoria Cross medal, the highest award for bravery in combat, and hears a story of incredible heroism during the First World War - with the staggering valuation of the humble bronze medal leaving its owners lost for words.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: The Narrow Road to the Deep North
channel.desc: Dorrigo returns from war and tries to get on with his life without Amy and many of his friends he lost to the POW camp.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: BBC Weekend News
channel.desc: The latest national and international news from the BBC.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: BBC London
channel.desc: News, sport and weather from London.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Match of the Day
channel.desc: The world's most famous football show, with the big names and the big games from the Premier League.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Destination X
channel.desc: The X-bus now makes its way to one of Europe's biggest wine making regions and the halfway point on this extraordinary journey, and host Rob Brydon still has plenty of tricks up his sleeve.
